files.description: Lightweight persistent JSON tracker storing cycle metadata, expected artifacts, validation status, and links/paths to QA reports for each run.

files.description: Utility module that defines the cycle tracker JSON schema, reads/writes/updates entries atomically, and provides helpers for linking validation/QA outputs.

FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/cycle_tracker.py

SUMMARY: Added cycle_tracker utility module providing a JSON schema, atomic read/write, and helpers to upsert cycles, record validation status, and link QA report paths.

files.description: Validation harness that checks for required artifacts, generates/collects QA report paths, and updates runtime/outputs/logs/CYCLE_TRACKER.json on every run with cycle id/date, expectations, and pass/fail status.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/validate_outputs.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/cycle_tracker.py", "scripts/linkcheck_runner.py", "scripts/run_scaffold.py", "scripts/update_project_tracker.py", "scripts/validate_outputs.py"]
Summary: Wrote a validation harness that checks expected artifacts, emits a QA validation report, and appends each run’s status/links into runtime/outputs/logs/CYCLE_TRACKER.json atomically.

FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/validate_outputs.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/cycle_tracker.py", "scripts/linkcheck_runner.py", "scripts/run_scaffold.py", "scripts/update_project_tracker.py", "scripts/validate_outputs.py"]
Summary: Added a self-contained validation harness that checks expected artifacts, collects QA report paths, and atomically updates runtime/outputs/logs/CYCLE_TRACKER.json each run.

missionDescription: Add a lightweight tracker file (e.g., `runtime/outputs/logs/CYCLE_TRACKER.json`) that records cycle id/date, expected artifacts, validation status, and links to QA reports; require it to be updated by the validation harness.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly enforces the strategic directive that each cycle produces validated artifacts by coupling output generation to schema validation + a tracker, preventing 'insights-only' progress that QA can’t...
